main.name: Neetish Pathak
main.description: Work on large scale systems by Day, full stack Dev by Night & Learner for Life.
main.bio: My name is Neetish, I'm a Software systems Engineer. Currently I'm working at PayPal in the Bay Area
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: I am interested in computer systems and networks. Computer and network Security is another domain that excites me. I have an MS in Computer Networking from NCSU, USA and a BE in Electrical Engineering from BITS Pilani, India. I love to work on projects that involve systems understanding and analysis. Nothing motivates me better than solving Real life problems.

projects.title: MERN Stack WhatsApp Clone
projects.category: WhatsApp Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: TLS Performance Analysis
projects.category: Comparison of TLS 1.3 & 1.2 full-handshake, resumption and early data with variable network latency, throughput and packet loss

testimonials.text: An asset to any organisation, Neetish is an extremely personable, dedicated, very professional in conduct and a team player to work with. He posses a never give up attitude and works to see success in all endeavors
